page.title: 02AERODROME AND R.A.F.HENDON
page.content: Claude Grahame White established Hendon Aerodrome in 1910.Many famous flights started at Hendon Aerodrome including the first long distance flight and the first night flight.The first aerial post started at Hendon and ended at Windsor with mail for His Majesty the King George V.Grahame White also had an aeroplane factory at Hendon.The main function of RAF Hendon today is JSATC Joint Services Air Trooping Centre which deals with the movement of service personnel from the United Kingdom to stations in foreign countries. We dont know how many people work at RAF Hendon as the information cannot be disclosed for security reasons.The last time an aeroplane took off from Hendon was in 1957 and the aerodrome was finally closed down because modern aircraft needed longer runways.
